plugin.name: anyshake
plugin.description: Global options for the AnyShake plugin

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Timeout value for the TCP connection to the AnyShake Observer forwarder, in seconds. If the connection cannot be established within this period, the plugin will retry later.

binding.name: anyshake
binding.description: Receives seismic data from the AnyShake Observer TCP forwarder

parameter.name: address
parameter.description: Address of the TCP forwarder service provided by AnyShake Observer. Format: [host]:[port], e.g., 127.0.0.1:30000

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.description: Connection timeout in seconds when attempting to reach the forwarder.
